name: Fishy Situation
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam 108.

This game is about fishing to pay your debt or else the bank will take your Seaside house from you.

  • Use the arrow keys to move.
  • This game does not support ultra wide screens.
  • Also the "Credits" button in the beggining does nothing. I didn't have time to implement it.
  • You'd notice even if I didn't tell you but my visual reference was Stardew Valley.
